detaileddescription.para: This function close all modules in WM8960 to save power.

briefdescription.para: Set audio data route in WM8960.

detaileddescription.para: This function would set the data route according to route.

briefdescription.para: Set left audio input source in WM8960.
Set right audio input source in WM8960.
Set the volume of different modules in WM8960.

detaileddescription.para: This function would set the volume of WM8960 modules. Uses need to appoint the module. The function assume that left channel and right channel has the same volume.

Module:wm8960_module_adc, volume range value: 0 is mute, 1-255 is -97db to 30db Module:wm8960_module_dac, volume range value: 0 is mute, 1-255 is -127db to 0db Module:wm8960_module_headphone, volume range value: 0 - 2F is mute, 0x30 - 0x7F is -73db to 6db Module:wm8960_module_ana_in, volume range value: 0 - 0x3F is -17.25db to 30db Module:wm8960_module_speaker, volume range value: 0 - 2F is mute, 0x30 - 0x7F is -73db to 6db

parameterdescription.para: Module to set volume, it can be ADC, DAC, Headphone and so on.
Volume value need to be set.

memberdef.argsstring: (wm8960_control_t *control, uint32_t sysclk, uint32_t sample_rate, uint32_t bits)
memberdef.name: wm8960_set_data_format

briefdescription.para: Configure the data format of audio data.

detaileddescription.para: This function would configure the registers about the sample rate, bit depths.

parameterdescription.para: system clock of the codec which can be generated by MCLK or PLL output.
Sample rate of audio file running in WM8960. WM8960 now supports 8k, 11.025k, 12k, 16k, 22.05k, 24k, 32k, 44.1k, 48k and 96k sample rate.
Bit depth of audio file (WM8960 only supports 16bit, 20bit, 24bit and 32 bit in HW).

simplesect.para: kStatus_WM8904_Success if successful, different code otherwise..

briefdescription.para: Write register to WM8960 using I2C.

parameterdescription.para: Value needs to write into the register.

briefdescription.para: Read register from WM8960 using I2C.

memberdef.argsstring: (wm8960_control_t *control, uint8_t reg, uint16_t mask, uint16_t val)
memberdef.name: wm8960_modify_reg

briefdescription.para: Modify some bits in the register using I2C.

parameterdescription.para: The mask code for the bits want to write. The bit you want to write should be 0.
Value needs to write into the register.
